website_summaries.verdict: A basic plastic trash can that won't take up too much room in a small bathroom.
pros: Narrow trash can good for tight spaces
cons: A few customers have complained of scratched products

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was a bit worried, but I was very happy when it arrived. The color matched perfectly, there were no broken pieces, and only a very small amount of scratches that aren’t noticeable. The plastic is whitish around some of the seams, bit that’s just the nature of thin and translucent plastic. And also because it’s thin plastic it is going to scuff a bit. But it’s absolutely perfect for what I needed it for, and because the color is exactly as advertised it fits in perfectly with the color scheme of my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller that you think - works for small spaces...
customer_reviews.text: Should be cheaper, but it matches the décor in my living room, so I bought it. It's only 12" tall and 11.2" wide. The depth is about 7.2" at the top and tapers down to 5" at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Dana~

customer_reviews.title: Trash can was scratched up on all sides when I pulled it out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I pulled this trashcan out if the box, it has these vertical lines and scratchy patches all over the can, and they won't wipe off. I understand this is just a trash can, but for the money and the fact it is brand new it's already cosmetically messed up. Disappointed but not worth the headache of sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Wolfkill

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product is used: It was dirty and scratched. I've kept it because its place is between the commode and the vanity, so the scratching doesn't show. Otherwise, it started life as a fine product, but beware of how any others have been treated since.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with top corners broken off
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with the top corners broken off. There were no pieces of broken plastic in the shipping box so I know the trash can was broken before it was shipped to me. It is made of a brittle plastic that shatters.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk. Wasn't even the color represented. Also arrived scratched up on one side. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rea

customer_reviews.title: thin plastic, a little easy to shatter
customer_reviews.text: It didn't look bad while still in the box, but when you took it out you would immediately notice it is made with thin cheap plastic--- you can see though the trash can. Also it is one single dull color throughout, not the gradient tone as suggested by picture. Before I get a chance to send it back, I tipped it over and the corner shattered. It could be a hidden crack happened during shipping but probably tells you enough the quality of this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, except...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, just as pictured...my picture shows more blue but, it is on the green side. Plastic has good thickness. There is white, powdery substance inside plastic and air pockets, all around bottom trash can...might return it because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Link37

customer_reviews.title: Love these wastebaskets!
customer_reviews.text: I researched trash cans a little obsessively (a lot obsessively?) and finally settled on these because I liked the colors. We bought 5. So far they are all gorgeous and a great size for bedrooms and bathrooms. I was worried about getting something too small but these are a good size--generous without being huge. We did have one which arrived cracked (in a giant box with other items and clearly was smushed) but they are sending us a new one immediately without charge. Very very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper, more greenish than bluish
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can matches our mint green bathroom rug better than other accessories do. I like the smooth finish; it will be very easy to clean. It is translucent and a solid color, even though the picture looks like it might be two toned. The inside-bottom of the garbage can doesn't go all the way to the floor. The outer edges do, leaving a recessed area underneath on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Not the size stated.
customer_reviews.text: The description says the bottom is twelve inches. It's not. It's smaller. I have a size 11 foot, and ordered this to soak a foot with Epson salts. My foot wouldn't fit. It seems like a perfect light wastebasket, (which is actually it's purpose), but the dimensions described aren't what it is. This probably matter for those who want a trash basket - for that it's perfect. Just know the size is an inch or two smaller than described.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Came dirty and scratched. It is not a true orange, but very pinkish-orange. Returning costs a lot. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mamulik

customer_reviews.title: Scratched up - unsuitable for use in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This arrived wrapped in heavy duty paper and in its own box; nonetheless, the two large sides are both all scratched up. Not worth the money to return it so will use it for something in the garage. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: susaninmontana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received cracked and broken twice.Packaging had no cushioning for item whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep Scratches
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my small office and the color was as described but the deeps scratches made it less than a great experience. I hide the damaged side next to my desk but I didn’t want to purchase damaged goods and it would cost almost to send back as it was to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Deloney

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Wastebasket!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my granddaughter, for her bedroom. It goes well with the room and is a perfect size for her needs. She loves it, and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: CarolynCAG

customer_reviews.title: Great can scuffed in shipping....
customer_reviews.text: It's a trash can, you slap a bag in it and you place it down. Mine arrived fast and I was slightly disappointed when I took it out and found it was scuffed up. Love the look, didn't like it being scuffed up. Decided to keep it either way. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Raime Friedmann

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Expected it to a bit more opaque. Expensive for the plastic
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: great for small space
customer_reviews.text: love the frost color! does not look cheap. great quality and great size for a tight space between your vanity and toilet!!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking deep sky blue & fairly sturdy. Opaque but I use a trash bag in all my waste basket just to keep them cleaner. I like the shape and the size is perfect for my bathroom. Living on an island, it's not easy to find a good variety of colors and the prices here can be quite high so the price for this was decent comparatively speaking. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tropigal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: This trash can serves its purpose as it stands sentry between the wall and my toilet. Looks great with my pink flamingo themed bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: TrueOBSESSION

customer_reviews.title: Packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: Trash can itself is actually nice, I got them in color “pear” and I love it, however one of them came cracked on the side and after reading about returning/exchanging it, I decided not to deal with it, all that hassle just to exchange a $13 product seems too much. If packaging was better (mine literally came in a box with nothing wrapped around it, not even 1 layer of bubble wrap), I would totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't purchase again. This one and another that I purchased were disappointing and both were covered in scratches. not worth sending them back
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great value Waste Can
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in the tight spot next to the toilet. Small plastic waste can liner fits perfectly. Seems sturdy for the price. Lemon-Lime color matches my other bathroom accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, different color than in the picture!!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can arrived and has weird white spots in the design in multiple places and the color is a completely different and much darker shade of blue than advertised. Not Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: This wastebasket was a little larger than I anticipated, but it still fits the space I had in mind. I like the looks, and the capacity is just right for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Scuffed Basket
customer_reviews.text: Every side was scratched and scuffed up. My bad as I didn’t read it was plastic. The color and size is good, but this thing is used. Going to look into returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Escavacini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, But ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful trash can, perfect for the bathroom. It arrived in a box by itself with a lot of air pouch packing around it. However, one side is seriously all scratched up -- had to have been put in the box that way. It would definitely be going back if my company was arriving before I could get a replacement one. Disappointed with the condition of this brand new item. If you're lucky enough to get one in great condition, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leane Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Yellowish tint to the White can
customer_reviews.text: It’s all great just wish the white was actually white. It’s like the white that is a nasty washed out color after being in a room with smokers for 5 years. Kinda ugly but I put a bag over it any for the bathroom trash lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jasslin

customer_reviews.title: Why not have a pretty trash bin?
customer_reviews.text: It has walls and a bottom. Holds garbage as it should. Paid almost twice as much to have a pink color but it’s so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Dragons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Garbage Can for Bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small garbage can for bedrooms. Perfect size for small garbage bags, exactly what I needed and wanted. Thank you for the super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like displayed in the pic
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like displayed in the pic. Minds actually came used from the looks of it. It had scratches and not shiny at all. The only reason I didn't return it is because I was too lazy to deal with the hassle of returning it and shipping it off.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Love the blue color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect blue color to match my bathroom. Works well for the space I have. It is the perfect small trash can for bathrooms, bedrooms or baby rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but marred by broken corner
customer_reviews.text: Kept even though corner lip was broken off. Pretty, shiny and mostly durable, but the plastic has a small lip around the top and a piece of that at one corner was broken off. Since I’m using it under a table at my bedside, on the far side of the bed I decided to keep it anyway and just turn it so the bad part isn’t easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: NHTMU

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape and color
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this trash can for my son’s dorm room. I liked the color and shape so much I ordered one for my house. Both arrived in perfect condition w no scratches. The navy color is very nice. It will be very easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: Works in my lilac bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: The waste basket fits in my bathroom and matches the décor.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Picard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice color
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice thick plastic so it is quite sturdy. I got the pink and I really like the color. It was a good price and I didn't have to go out shopping for it so all around it was a win.
customer_reviews.author: Beth I-L

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Item can scratched in multiple places and just simply not worth the money. Worth maybe $5 . Just simply flimsy plastic but the shape is perfect for right places and the color was as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: The blue is a beautiful color, and it goes well in my living room. There is a simple elegance about it. I’m very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: KKP

customer_reviews.title: VERY cute
customer_reviews.text: VERY cute, it’s surprisingly hard to find simple things like this in a store and the color is so cute. Good size, doesn’t smell like plastic or anything, will keep this for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Purchased 4 of them and 1 came in the mail broken the second broke within a week. I still have 2 that are holding up however they are treated very delicately. They seem a little opaque and slightly translucent.
customer_reviews.author: Kittery

customer_reviews.title: Damaged trash can
customer_reviews.text: this trash can arrived today and it was packed terribly and one side is incredible scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was rubbed against concrete
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all scratched and marked up. Looks like it was rubbed against concrete. Was not protected at all..just put in box with other items. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: Trash can is GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: The trash can arrived all scraped up and in terrible shape! I am super disappointed and would not recommend buying this item. I wish I could send it back but it would cost more time in money, gas and postage than it is worth!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Broken...They don't give you much time to return!
customer_reviews.text: Item was broken. We we're remodeling a room and I didn't discover it broken until a week after the returnable date deadline. Normally get a little longer time to return but of course now I'm stuck with a damaged trashcan!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Just like the pic navy blue
customer_reviews.text: Good quality And good price Thank you very much for the good quality you made. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: imane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and fits in small spaces well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Matches perfectly with my teal themed restroom. Rather a narrow space, and it fit perfectly. Really happy with that. Easy to clean cause you can simply rinse, add any solution, rinse, and drip dry.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphina

customer_reviews.title: its a nice color and I like the size
customer_reviews.text: its a nice color and I like the size. perfect for our bathroom. my only complaint is the color is a little see-through as if the material itself is too thin. but for a bathroom trash can it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the green one and it is a little see-through but that doesn’t bother me. I still love it for my bathroom! It is actually a little bigger than I thought, I reuse grocery store plastic bags as mini trash bags and there is a little bit more room in the can after you put the bag in.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Deweese

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I received my new office trash can yesterday. I love it. It is the perfect size, it is the perfect color. Other reviewers said that their can came with scratches, but that was not the case with me. It came in perfect condition. The color is what I expected as well (other reviewers noted different color than they thought).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean not like the cheap plastic that smears dust sturdy and great for the bathroom looks good and not cheap
customer_reviews.author: shanice williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: Color is just as pictured and it is the perfect size for a bathroom or bedroom...anywhere that space is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Not like in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really have a design like the one shown, also a mishap in the moulding process possibly
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not clear or white
customer_reviews.text: I order the white trash can and it straight up is tinted yellow. Everything else about it is great except that it looks Like I had the trash can for 15 years and it aged into the color it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, different color
customer_reviews.text: 1. Color doesn't match the photo at all (I purchased azure, a bright blue) 2. Scratches all over 3. Cracks and separated plastic all over Please see the photos. This is unusable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We got some decals and used turned these into a great recycling bins for around the house. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CuppaJo

customer_reviews.title: If you need trash cans, buy these!  Period.
customer_reviews.text: Being recently single, I needed trash can for the bathrooms. Fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 1964A

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but nothing outstanding
customer_reviews.text: It is quite flimsy in feeling although it seems to be well enough made. The color blends in fine with our natural tile bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: dijit

customer_reviews.title: small and durable for show
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wastebasket in black. It's shiny and modern and will be out in the open next to my desk, which is why I bought such an aesthetic one. It's short so it won't be able to hold much of your bulk trash, ie from the kitchen, but small things perhaps in a bathroom as well. A bit pricey for my liking, I saw similar cans at other stores, but I'm keeping this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tabasco

customer_reviews.title: Cute little trash can perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little trash can! It fits right next to my toilet. I bought 4 gallon trash bags for it and they seem to fit just fine. I also like that it's a frosted clear color, it looks very modern.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice sized
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice sized, sturdy trash can. The color didn't really match the picture though so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Came with scratches, and is NOT sized as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It had lots of scratches all over it, which were certainly not from shipping. It's also NOT sized as listed. It's 12" tall, not 9.75".
customer_reviews.author: MarkerB

customer_reviews.title: The Return Will Get You...
customer_reviews.text: Received 1 broken basket. I did get satisfaction with returning that one basket. The baskets were smaller than I needed, so I wanted to return them - shipping was going to cost MORE than the baskets did! Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my sons bathroom. Perfect size and color. Is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Terilyn

customer_reviews.title: Color, in this instance.
customer_reviews.text: The garbage bin is ok but the color is too light. Not what I expected and I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Naima

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It came all scratched up. I could have gone to the 99 cents store. Not presentable looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived. There's this gross white stuff at the bottom of the trash barrel. It's on both sides of the barrel. It's inside the material somehow. Looks ugly and gross almost like a fungus growing. It's too much work to return it so I guess we'll keep it. Wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, very sturdy. The shape is perfect for small spaces, which was surprising bc it's a decent size. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Turner

customer_reviews.title: Never recieved
customer_reviews.text: I recieved silicone trays instead of the trash can. Now I have to go out of my way to return trays I never ordered so I can get the trash can? What a pain and rip off!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, nice size, and style.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small trash can that fits right between my bedroom end table and bed. I wish it was slightly larger, but it's a good size for small spaces and not a lot of use. The plastic is thicker/more durable than I was expecting, which was a pleasant surprise. The frosted white is a nice color. It's a 5-sided trash can, not much else to say. :)
customer_reviews.author: hml.anon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged due to poor packaging. Aside from that it was what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks good by my makeup vanity. I put a washable cloth liner in it to help keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Exquisite Essentials

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: i bought 4 of these (pink, white, water and light green) after renovating our upstairs. they're light, sturdy, and easy to wash. I like their unobtrusive look and the pastel colors. they slide nicely between a vanity and a wall, or toilet and wall. Love the choice of colors.
customer_reviews.author: N. F. Zandoli

customer_reviews.title: Great color and it will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for a tight spot. Holds more than you would think. Great color and it will last a long time. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine Bello

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and durable. Picture is a little off in color, but it looks fantastic in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: godgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color
customer_reviews.text: I love it and the color matched the bathroom paint perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it. Doesnt take up much space. Nice sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, product, & delivery!! Very pleased thanks a bunch!!👍😀⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, product, & delivery!! Very pleased thanks a bunch!!👍😀⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Celeste Costillo

customer_reviews.title: Trash can
customer_reviews.text: Tis a trash can, plastic trash can, color is true.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like it for every reason but one. I was hoping it was a dark purple but I was wrong. It is lavender. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Rene Lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: Nice turquoise color. Smaller than I thought but for the price it’s a nice product. Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Huff

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is exactly like the picture! It is thick so it’s not going to break to easily and the color is very pretty as well!!! Do recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Victory

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This product is made from a heavy plastic and larger than the one I had which I am pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY FINE WASTEBASKET..NO SCRATCHES EVEB ONE TONE BLUE
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can complain about are the complaints! These poor souls must have gotten used or seconds from an unscrupulous seller...it happen..Take ir up with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Daring1

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sized wastebasket for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized wastebasket for the bathroom. I usually use bags inside. This one holds an ordinary plastic shopping bag very well. Great way to recycle the bags. It is a lighter purple and goes well if you love purple like I do and like to mix and match shades of purple.
customer_reviews.author: Lissett Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Made with substandard materials
customer_reviews.text: Made with a heavy, brittle plastic with a yellowish tinge. Two of the three I ordered had small cracks and chips. Too much trouble to return, but I would not order these again.
customer_reviews.author: A-Dot

customer_reviews.title: Slim shape
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly in the bathroom. I like the sleek shape. Simple sleek style.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute compact trash can
customer_reviews.text: I like my new trashcan, it was purchased for my bathroom and goes great with my new decor. It seems very sturdy and easy to clean, no elbow grease involved. I think it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, fairly cheap looking plastic trash can, ok for what it is
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: so nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: this looks beautiful and its good quality and perfect size..love it.
customer_reviews.author: Confused buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great can
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can! Matches the colors in the bathroom perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE DESIGN, SOLID FUNCTION, FUN COLORS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE THREE OF THESE SMALL TRASH CANS. THOUGH THEY ARE MADE OUT OF SOME SORT OF PLASTIC, THEY ARE SURPRISINGLY SOLID AND NOT AT ALL FLIMSY. I TRIED ANOTHER SIMILAR LOOKING BRAND, BUT REGRETTED IT. I SHOULD HAVE STUCK WITH THESE, PLUS THE ASSORTMENT OF COLORS ARE ALL TERRIFIC.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an assisted living resident. Fits well into small space and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: TS Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and just the right size for plastic shopping bag insert.
customer_reviews.author: gaghi

customer_reviews.title: Not trashy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. A little small compared to other trash cans had. But perfect size for where it was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Piaf fan

customer_reviews.title: Roomy without taking up too much space
customer_reviews.text: Roomy without taking up too much space. Bought it for a small bathroom space. White was great color too
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight sturdy trashcan is exactly what my bathroom needed! They come in a variety of colors to fit your needs. It is just the right size and it cleans easily as well! It came right on time and it was exactly what I ordered! This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my room. It's small enough to not be in the way and large enough to actually hold any garbage I need to throw away. The square design is perfect for next to my TV stand. Very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: B Krey

customer_reviews.title: Cute but odd
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable little trash can; the color is a little different than it appears; and it's shape makes it hard to dispose of some trash. However, I would certainly buy it again
customer_reviews.author: shirley conrad

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful colour. It is almost an opalescent jade green ...
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful colour. It is almost an opalescent jade green colouring. Fabulous. Great quality to boot. Elegant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: iDesign Spa Rectangular Trash, Waste Basket Garbage Can for Bathroom, Bedroom, Home Office, Dorm, College, 2.5 Gallon, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackDesigned with style and function in mind, the iDesign Mono Waste Basket provides convenient trash disposal wherever you need it. This compact waste can fits into tight spaces in the bathroom, kitchen, bedroom, laundry room, office, dorm, and more. The versatile design makes it great for use as a trash can or recycling bin, and it can also be used to provide extra storage space for cleaning supplies. The modern lines, rectangular shape, and sleek black color add a touch of style to any room. Made with durable BPA-free plastic, this waste can stands up to every day use and is easy to clean with mild soap and water. This slim-profile trash bin measures 11.25" x 7.5" x 12" with a 2.5 gallon capacity and is ideal for compact spaces around the home. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
